Flash-frozen for Freshness.Elite 1: After Solidification or Originium Crystals are applied to a nearby enemy, Alesh gains 3 Ultimate Energy. If the said Solidification is applied by Alesh, he gains an additional 6 Ultimate Energy. This effect can only trigger once every 3s.
Flash-frozen for Freshness.Elite 2: After Solidification or Originium Crystals are applied to a nearby enemy, Alesh gains 4 Ultimate Energy. If the said Solidification is applied by Alesh, he gains an additional 8 Ultimate Energy. This effect can only trigger once every 3s.

Veteran Angler.Elite 2: Combo skill Auger Angling improved: Every 10 Intellect grants Rare Fin catching chance +0.2% (max: +30%).
Veteran Angler.Elite 3: Combo skill Auger Angling improved: Every 10 Intellect grants Rare Fin catching chance +0.5% (max: +30%).

Casual Angling.Elite 1: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +8%
Casual Angling.Elite 3: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +12%

Anglers' Intel Network.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators a small Clue 1 Rate-UP: UWST (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
Anglers' Intel Network.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operators Clue 1 Rate-UP: UWST (activates upon assignment; effects of the same type cannot stack)
